    • Constructor Detail

      • DragWidgetHelper

        public DragWidgetHelper(MapView mapView,
                        java.lang.String preferenceKey,
                        MapWidget mw)
        Helper class to allow for easier implementation of draggable widgets. This widget should not be expected to honor click events.
        Parameters:
        mapView - the mapView
        preferenceKey - the key used to store the x and y values as part of the dragging.

    • Method Detail

      • getUpperLeft

        public android.graphics.PointF getUpperLeft()
        Get the upper left of the mapWidget based on the position of the mapWidget at the current orientation. Will return the preference for the widget as it was saved in the system.
        Returns:
        the upper left point for the widget
